summary: ENBs terrain parallax without nasty overlay transitions on meshes
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][font=vijaya] [color=DarkSalmon]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/Hein84-1145178992160965/]reach me on Facebook[/url][/color][line][/font][/size][/center]
This small mod allows you to use ENB's terrain parallax without having nasty texture transitions on landscape meshes in a very performance friendly way.

Terrain parallax looks just great but it needs textures alpha channel to work...
problem is, this one is already in use for overlay transitions on meshes...

I solved the issue by adapting the alpha threshold levels on landscape meshes, the channel works for both cases now.


Let me know if I missed something ;)
author: Hein84

files.name: Terrain Parallax Fix - for Vivid Landscapes Users
